data.title: Alignment Station offset in profile view
data.meta_description: Is there anyway to display Alignment Station Offset Label at Profile View because sometimes i want to display where is the phisical noze location in
data.text:
Is there anyway to display Alignment Station Offset Label at Profile View because sometimes i want to display where is the phisical noze location in profile view also my attached file display what i have in my label and hopefully someone can advice to me to how display my label in profile view.

Thank you in advance.

Please do not forget approve as solutions and Points

to Remember Please Accept as Solution and Kudos Please

I'm not sure if this is exactly what you want, but it is possible to add reference text to a profile view label showing a station and offset from another alignment.

Steve

Please use the Accept as Solution or Kudo buttons when appropriate

Steve

Expert Elite Alumnus

Thank you Mr.Steve for your reply.

So how we can do that.

Because i tried many times but without any success.

So hopefully you can give me advice.

Thank you.

Please do not forget approve as solutions and Points

to Remember Please Accept as Solution and Kudos Please

In this example I've inserted a profile view label for the Road A alignment. I then edited that style to add a piece of Reference text for the other alignment. The new piece of text currently displays as ???

When the label is selected the Properties dialog displays the object that the Reference Text is referring to. Clicking on the field currently showing <none> should bring up an option on the command line to pick the other alignment.

Steve

Please use the Accept as Solution or Kudo buttons when appropriate

Steve

Expert Elite Alumnus

I really appreciate for your effort Mr.Steve,

But one more thing, Actually i have many interchanges so do you have any idea if there is available way to superimpose locations of phisical nozes from layout plan to profile view with label that display tha name and offset of adjacent alignments.

My idea is to superimpose cogo point in the profile view but i can't figure out if there is a way to display adjacent alignment name and offset of the label for cogo points.

I think it can be done by expressions but i don't know how can i do that.

Thank you in advance.

Please do not forget approve as solutions and Points

to Remember Please Accept as Solution and Kudos Please
